actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 and title 10, United States Code, to provide for the consideration of certain contract-related revenues of the Federal Government in the determination of which contract bid or proposal contains the lowest price.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 and Federal law relating to the armed forces to provide for the consideration of certain contract-related Federal revenues in the determination of which contract bid or proposal contains the lowest price.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 and title 10, United States Code, to provide for the consideration of certain contract-related revenues of the Federal Government in the determination of which contract bid or proposal contains the lowest price.
